Class HelperMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • Core.HelperMethods

  • public class HelperMethods
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of static methods for loading and unloading parts and wires
    Author:
    Jonathan

      Tries to take the string from a BasicPart subclass toString() method and makes a new instance of that class

    • Method Detail

      • packUp

        public static java.lang.String packUp(GUI panel)
        Takes the Parts and Wires currently active and turns their data into text for saving into a file.
        Parameters:
        panel - The GUI instance running everything
        Returns:
        A String that can be written to a file and from which the parts and wires can be reconstructed

      • reconstruct

        public static void reconstruct(GUI panel,
                               java.lang.String data)
        Used to reconstruct all parts from a String
        Parameters:
        panel - The instance of the GUI class
        data - The String generated by packUp

      • generateObject

        public static Parts.BasicPart generateObject(java.lang.String s)
        Tries to take the string from a BasicPart subclass toString() method and makes a new instance of that class
        Parameters:
        s - The result of the BasicPart subclass toString() method
        Returns:
        A new BasicPart

      • findPart

        private static Parts.BasePart findPart(int ID,
                                       GUI panel)
        Searches the active parts of the GUI instance for certain ID number
        Parameters:
        ID - Unique ID number to look for
        panel - Instance of GUI class running everything
        Returns:
        The BasePart with the ID, or null

      • unpack

        private static Packing.DataPack[] unpack(java.lang.String data)
        Tries to extract information from a string generated by packUp
        Parameters:
        data -
        Returns:
        An Array of DataPack objects which contain the data extracted
